description: Try our easy to follow Sweet Potato Beef Burgers recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Burger,Low salt,Low sugar,Beef,Microwave,High protein,High fibre,Sweet potato,Mince,Tomato,Peanut free
name: Sweet Potato Beef Burgers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 large sweet potato, cut into 8 x 1cm-thick rounds

recipeInstructions.text: Place mince, breadcrumbs, egg, dried herbs, garlic powder, salt and pepper in a mixing bowl and stir to combine. Divide mince into four patties and shape with hands. Set aside.
Arrange sweet potato slices on a microwave-safe plate and cook on high for 2 minutes or until starting to soften.

Preheat a barbecue grill or grill pan on medium-high heat. Spray sweet potato slices lightly with olive oil. Cook sweet potato and beef patties on grill for 3-4 minutes each side or until caramelised and cooked through.
Coat four sweet potato slices with hummus and top with beef patties. Top with remaining ingredients and finish with remaining sweet potato slices to serve.
